short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SilverBullet Clipper captures a web page URL or selected content, converts it to markdown and saves it in the SilverBullet Inbox

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SilverBullet Clipper is a browser extension for the SilverBullet note taking app that allows you to save either a URL or selected content from a page as markdown to SilverBullet. The capture is added as a Quick Note in the default SilverBullet inbox. Please keep in mind that it is not guaranteed to work on all websites.

To use this add-on, simply click the extension icon while you are browsing the page you want to capture. A popup will allow you to change the page title from the default timestamp and add any tags that you want to the page.
